# Introduction
This Shiny app presentation is in order to provide overview of my application.

This project will calculate calculate the factorial upto the number the user provides.


# Functionality
- User provides an integer in the input field.
- Application reads that number and calculates factorial number.
- Application displays the result.


# Calculations
Application requires following library:
```{r, echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
library(numbers)
```

Following formula is used to calculate factorial upto integer n:
```{r, echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
fact = factorial(n)
```
